reviewText: The video is pretty bad, the screen flips constantly.  I keep it because I can listen to her voice and have been doing the exercises for years so just follow the instructions.  I never look at the television when playing the video.
I love this workout so much, that I wore out the last tape I owned.

I have been doing ab classes at my gym 5 days a week, then i moved and I have been looking for a good ab workout to do at home. I am fairly intermediate, and i found this tape boring, and not challenging at all!!! I kept waiting for the exercises to get harder, but they never did and I barely worked my abs. okay for beginners, BAD FOR INTERMEDIATES...
i really liked the sequencing in this ab video...Hart has always been a favorite of mine and this is another one of ther great videos that is very effective and cued just right.
I loved it, it is great to do at any time, Hart is the ideal fitness instructor to me, I really enjoy this.

this is a great abdominal routine, Hart is superb at giving great instruction and this video is very fun and safe...I use it as part of my choroegraphy in my Abs class I teach, and this is video good stuff, I highly recommend anything Leisa Hart stars in, her videos are by far the best of all the instructors out there, and its great to know that she still teaches in clubs and stays in touch with her consumers, unlike some of the other goofy instructors(Tony Little, Denise Austin, Richard Simmons). Hart is the best!
